++ Armor

Defines the defensive capabilities of the hull of a ship.

- Amount: Defines the hitpoints of a ship. Once the Amount of the armor reaches 0 or less, the ship is destroyed.
- Strength: Defines the capability of the armor to absorb hits partially or fully. The strength of armor is 1 to 20, which results in damage reduction and a probability to completely deflect the incoming damage according to the [Damage Factor].
